name: Push Out — friends competition game
storyline:
There, on tropical islands, also lives Mr. Lion, who dreams to become the fastest lion in the whole world. He stands in need of your help! Explore every nook and cranny of the island and set up new world record!
Except all named characters you could also meet there a lot of giraffes-the-dummies and Crocodile-the-director.
summary: Grab your friends and make a journey to the magic islands with mysterious inhabitants. They can't solve who's the best: Mr. Crab or Vulcano, Mrs. Bird or Mr. Whale? Help them! And you can do it by yourself or with friends - there could be two, three or four players on screen at once!
